title: Peppol lookup
tagline: Look up Belgian companies on the Peppol network using their VAT or entrepreneur number
footer_text_post: , your all-in-1 business software with Peppol
error_input_required: Please enter a Belgian VAT or entrepreneur number.
error_company_not_found: Company not found in Peppol network
error_network_local_file: Network request was blocked by the browser when opened from a local file. Please run this page via a local web server or deploy it to a web host.
error_network_generic: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
error_lookup_unexpected: An unexpected error occurred during lookup.
error_not_registered: This company is not registered in the Peppol network.
error_unable_retrieve: Unable to retrieve company information. The company may not be registered in the Peppol network or the service is temporarily unavailable.
error_invalid_format: Invalid format. Belgian VAT/entrepreneur numbers should be 10 digits.

msg_9925_missing: VAT is not registered on Peppol
both_not_found_paragraph: You currently are not registered on the Peppol-network and can't receive invoices.
both_not_found_actions_title: What do you want to do?
